item.description:
Join the Northern Connecticut Land Trust and the Scantic River Watershed Association for this hike along the Scantic River in East Windsor and Enfield. Meet at 128 Melrose Road, East Windsor, CT. The event is scheduled to last until 4 PM.

This event is sponsored by the Northern CT Land Trust and the Scantic River Watershed Association.

For further information contact Albert Grant at Albert_Grant@sbcglobal.net. It is advised to e-mail and register your intent to go in case there is a cancellation. Cancellations may not make it onto the Hartford Area Hiking event calendar in time.

Location to meet up (and directions) can be found at:
http://www.mapquest.c...

No official Hartford Area Hiking leadership is planned to be at the hike at this time. Just mingle with the other hikers!

Northern Connecticut Land Trust (NCLT):
http://www.northernct...

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: NCLT hike along the Scantic R in E Windsor & Enfield CT
